# Changelog

## v2.0.0 (2025-01)

### New Features
- Multi-method detection (BLS, GLS, PDM) with consensus
- Transit Timing Variation (TTV) analysis
- Interactive Streamlit demo app
- Publication-quality visualization
- MCMC parameter estimation

### Improvements
- Comprehensive test suite
- ReadTheDocs documentation
- Example Jupyter notebooks

### Dependencies
- Added seaborn, h5py, streamlit
- Requires Python 3.9+

## v1.0.0 (2024)

- Initial release
- Basic BLS detection
- Transit signal generation
